itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the huge Warriors win last night and who got injured in the series, the Blues tying up the series against the Bruins, Khabib's next fight in the UFC, the shocking knockout of Anthony Joshua by Andy Ruiz, and if Kevan Looney is actually dead.
